Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1972...
Injured on 6/8/1972 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1976, off Pete Richert (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/1976, off Gaylord Perry (SF)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against California on 9/22/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/13/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/21/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $783,000 per year...
